title: Quotes to Scrape
text: “The opposite of love is not hate, it's indifference. The opposite of art is not ugliness, it's indifference. The opposite of faith is not heresy, it's indifference. And the opposite of life is not death, it's indifference.” by Elie Wiesel (about) “Think left and think right and think low and think high. Oh, the thinks you can think up if only you try!” by Dr. Seuss (about)
